name: Hall Of Maat
description:
Hall of Maat is A Maze-solving 3D Dual stick shooter with bullet hell and puzzle elements. Developed for PC platform, Utilizing Unity 2019 as the main engine.

Keyboard Controls:
WASD: Move Heart
Directional Arrows: Shoot in directions.

Xbox Controls:
Left Stick: Move Heart
Left Stick: Shoot in directions.

Instructions: Download the .Zip, Unload. Then execute HallofMaat Executable.
